structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Effect of change of status of city.
law.text: Any city covered by KRS 95.851 to 95.884 and KRS 95.991, which may subsequently change its form of government, its class, or other status shall continue to be covered by KRS 95.851 to 95.884 and KRS 95.991.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 83, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 11. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 31, effective July 1, 1956.

metadata.lrc-note: (11/21/96). In 1974, the Reviser of Statutes renumbered KRS 95.885 as KRS 95.991. 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 83, a revisory act, mistakenly changed references in this statute from "KRS 95.851 to 95.885" to "KRS 95.851 to 95.991." Because these changes would appear to effect a substantive change in the law, they have been disregarded, and the references have been made to read "KRS 95.851 to 95.884 and KRS 95.991" under KRS 7.123(4) and 7.136(1)(a).
